entities.description: Past year misuse of prescription sedatives classified with the disorder if meeting two or more criteria.
Problems caused by stimulant misuse, including issues with family or friends, mental health, or physical health.
Symptoms experienced when reducing or stopping stimulant use, such as feeling tired, dreams, sleeping issues, and emotional changes.
Criteria to classify past year misusers of prescription sedatives into varying severity levels.
Respondents who misused substances within the past year.

relationships.description: Indicates issues faced by stimulant misusers, such as problems with family or friends, reduced social activities, and increased physical harm.
Details the withdrawal symptoms experienced by stimulant misusers.
Prescription sedative use disorder is classified based on specific misuse criteria.
